Homemade Spaceship

Nomadism revisted.

Materializing

Soon, very soon more of this site will be intact, in fact, large portions of it are just now sprouting. A whole population of photographs, art projects, maps and discussions of things things we learn will burst out of the digital underground like mushrooms on the forest floor. And updates, oh there will be updates, and snacks too, so please visit again soon, very soon.

Until then, the old favorites are still alive and well:

Blog

Etsy Shop

We've expanded our online presence with one new site, a textiles focused discussion of the production and appreciation of all things woven, felted and worn. Join us in enjoying this most ancient and basic art form: New Tribe Textiles.

Get in Touch

We peddal our wares on Etsy, please help support the artists of your internet neighborhood. Talk to us via Twitter.

Your Hosts

Homemade Spaceship is Jeannie and Kyle, nomads and artists. You are reading our great world of stories and technology, art and creation and investigations into alternative ways of living.

As of December 2011, we've hung up our backpacks and boots for the moment and abated our nomad ways, at least superficially. If you are passing though Truth or Consequences stop by and visit as we almost certainly will be here.
